oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Joseph Scott Postmaster
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.); Greenback Post Office; Scott, Joseph; Hammontree, Ira; Woods, Will; Walker, Joseph; Tedford, James;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postmaster and postal carriers. Five men in a row; four are carrying satchels. They have on overcoats and hats. In front of the door is a sign with "Coca-Cola" and "Staple and Fancy Groceries." There are bars on the downstairs windows. Upstairs the siding is clapboard; the visible part of the first floor has diagonal wood siding.
